trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of CaptionAlign is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: CaptionAlign 的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" name="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" name="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的空間數量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CellPadding property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CellPadding 屬性來控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: All cells in the same column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項具有相同的寬度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width.
trans-unit.target: 填補數量會套用到最寬的資料格和資料行中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height.
trans-unit.target: 填補數量會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的高度。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the spacing between cells, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整儲存格之間的間距，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 以像素的儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的空間數量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之間的空間量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CellSpacing property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CellSpacing 屬性來控制在相鄰的資料格之間的間距<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: The cell spacing is uniform for the entire control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格間距是一致的整個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell spacing between rows or columns cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定個別資料格的資料列或資料行之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set this property to a value greater than 0, and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A> property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定這個屬性的值大於 0，，然後再設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A>屬性相鄰的資料格的框線之間顯示儲存格框線的值，顯示間隔。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the CellSpacing property controls the size of the gap.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，CellSpacing 屬性控制的差距大小。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: 以像素的儲存格之間的空間數量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Switches the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control to the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 交換器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>指定模式的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the ChangeMode method to programmatically switch the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control between edit, insert, and read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式切換使用 ChangeMode 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>之間編輯、 插入和唯讀模式的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This method also updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property with the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性以指定的模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsView.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.|
trans-unit.target: |模式 |描述 | |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。 | |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。 | |`DetailsView.ReadOnly`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of a command row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定命令列中的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandRowStyle property to control the appearance of a command row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CommandRowStyle 屬性來控制中的命令列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A command row contains the command buttons to perform operations such as editing, deleting, and inserting.
trans-unit.target: 命令列包含要執行作業，例如編輯、 刪除和插入的命令按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `CommandRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `CommandRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CommandRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CommandRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of a command row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示命令列中的樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"></xref> object that represents an automatically generated row field using the specified field properties.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"></xref>物件，代表使用指定的欄位屬性的自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: The CreateAutoGeneratedRow method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create an automatically generated row field using the specified field properties.
trans-unit.target: CreateAutoGeneratedRow 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立使用指定的欄位屬性的自動產生的資料列欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties"></xref> that contains the properties for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties"> </xref> ，其中包含針對屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An that contains the field properties specified by the fieldProperties parameter.
trans-unit.target: ，其中包含所指定的欄位屬性 fieldProperties 參數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of automatically generated row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: 建立一組指定的資料項目的自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, the CreateAutoGeneratedRows method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a set of automatically generated row fields for the current data item.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性設定為`true`，CreateAutoGeneratedRows 方法由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立一組自動產生資料列的目前資料的項目欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data item for which to create the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的自動產生的資料列欄位的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the automatically generated row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>，其中包含指定的資料項目的自動產生的資料列欄位。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control does not have any properties or attributes from which to generate fields.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref>控制項沒有任何屬性或要從中產生欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立用來呈現的控制項階層架構<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the control hierarchy for the control.
trans-unit.target: CreateChildControls 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立控制項的控制項階層架構。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that represents the data source for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>表示的資料來源<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that this method is being called during data binding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示資料繫結; 期間呼叫這個方法否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default table style object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立預設資料表樣式物件，以便<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create its default table style object.
trans-unit.target: CreateControlStyle 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>來建立其預設資料表樣式物件的控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the default style setting of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> object, this method also sets the properties in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 除了預設樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>物件，這個方法也設定下表中的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.GridLines%2A>|`GridLines.Both`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.CellSpacing%2A>|0|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.GridLines%2A>|`GridLines.Both`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.CellSpacing%2A>|0|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.CellSpacing%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the default table style for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> ，其中包含的預設資料表樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that gets passed to the Select command.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>取得傳遞給 Select 命令的物件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataSourceSelectArguments method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that gets passed to the Select command.
trans-unit.target: CreateDataSourceSelectArguments 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>取得傳遞給 Select 命令的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that gets passed to the Select command
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>傳遞給 Select 命令

trans-unit.source: Creates the complete set of automatically generated and user-defined row fields used to generate the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 建立一組完整的自動產生和使用者定義的資料列欄位用來產生在控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The CreateFieldSet method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the complete set of row fields for the control.
trans-unit.target: CreateFieldSet 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立一組完整的資料列控制項的欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, automatically generated row fields are appended to the user-defined row fields contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性設定為`true`為自動產生資料列欄位會附加至包含的使用者定義的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create the automatically generated row fields based on the data item, pass in `true` for the `useDataSource` parameter; otherwise, the automatically generated row fields are created based on properties of the existing row fields in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的自動產生的資料列欄位，根據資料的項目，請傳入`true`如`useDataSource`參數; 否則會自動產生的資料列欄位會根據建立的現有資料列欄位控制項中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The data item for which to create the row fields.
trans-unit.target: 要建立資料列欄位的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the data item to create the automatically generated row fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要建立的自動產生的資料列欄位; 使用資料項目否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains both the automatically generated and the user-defined row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>包含自動產生和使用者定義的資料列的欄位指定的資料項目。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object using the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>物件使用指定的項目索引、 資料列類型和資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: The CreateRow method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: CreateRow 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item to display.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示之資料項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> with the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref>具有指定的項目之索引、 資料列類型和資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: Creates the containing table for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立包含資料表的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The CreateTable method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a table that acts as the container for the control.
trans-unit.target: CreateTable 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立資料表做為控制項的容器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> that represents the containing table for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"> </xref> ，代表包含資料表的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current data-entry mode of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的資料輸入模式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the CurrentMode property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CurrentMode 屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| This value is normally set automatically by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control by when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: |模式 |描述 | |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。 | |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。 | |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。 | 這個值通常自動設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>時新增、 更新、 插入、 刪除或取消命令按鈕控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically change the mode by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以也以程式設計方式變更模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式，則下表中的事件會引發。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a routine when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式，在事件發生時執行常式。

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>|Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but after the mode changes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>|Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but before the mode changes.|
trans-unit.target: |事件 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>|發生於按一下變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項模式的命令按鈕時，但模式變更之後。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>|發生於變更的模式，在命令按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時，模式變更之前，但。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>方法的基底類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls should override <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PerformDataBinding%2A> instead of DataBind.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項應該覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PerformDataBinding%2A>而不是資料繫結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料的項目繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to access the data item bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 存取資料項目的 DataItem 屬性繫結至使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The data item is often used to access the field values of the current record directly.
trans-unit.target: 資料的項目通常用於直接存取目前記錄的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref:System.Object> returned by this property varies depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Object>傳回此屬性會根據資料來源而有所不同。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>物件傳回。</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is available only after data binding has occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 只在發生資料繫結之後，便使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Before data binding occurs, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結之前，這個屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: This property is also not applicable when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode and returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，也不適用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式，並傳回`null`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data item bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，代表資料的項目繫結至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎資料來源中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the DataItemCount property to determine the total number of records in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，使用 DataItemCount 屬性來判斷基礎資料來源中的記錄總數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays only one record at a time, this value also corresponds to the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會顯示一次只有一筆記錄，此值也會對應至顯示資料來源中的每一筆記錄所需的分頁總數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the current record from the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷目前的記錄從基礎資料來源的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料來源中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item being displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得要顯示在項目的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>從基礎資料來源的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the DataItemIndex property to determine the index of the currently displayed record.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，使用 DataItemIndex 屬性來判斷目前所顯示的記錄的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式變更顯示的記錄。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the paging feature is enabled, you can also use this property to determine the page number of the record displayed; however, be aware that this property is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 啟用分頁功能時，您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷顯示; 記錄的頁面數目但是要注意這個屬性是以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷資料來源中的項目總數，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item being displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引中所顯示的資料項目的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>從基礎資料來源的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object that represents the primary key of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref>物件，代表顯示的資料錄的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that represents the key field or fields for the current record.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件，代表目前記錄的索引鍵欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKey property to get this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataKey 屬性來取得這<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to obtain the keys and their corresponding values for the fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用來取得索引鍵和其對應的值中指定的欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A> property to determine the value of the first key field listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，請您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A>屬性來判斷中所列的第一個索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> that represents the primary key of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref> ，代表顯示的資料錄的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the key fields for the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定陣列，其中包含資料來源的索引鍵欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeyNames property to specify a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 請使用 DataKeyNames 屬性指定以逗號分隔清單的欄位名稱代表資料來源的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: When the DataKeyNames property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that represents the key field or fields for the current record and stores it in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當設定的 DataKeyNames 屬性時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件，代表目前記錄的索引鍵欄位，並將其儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is also set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the DataKeyNames property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性也會設為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制會自動確保 DataKeyNames 屬性中指定的欄位為唯讀。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set the DataKeyNames property for the automatic updating, deleting, and inserting features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您必須設定自動更新、 刪除和插入功能 DataKeyNames 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>運作的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>屬性的資料列欄位設定為`false`，資料列不會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制和資料列的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the DataKeyNames property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要看不到構成來回行程的資料列資料，請將欄位名稱加入至 DataKeyNames 屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the key fields of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中包含資料來源的索引鍵欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the default data-entry mode of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的預設資料輸入模式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the DefaultMode property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an edit or insert operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DefaultMode 屬性來指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項的編輯或 insert 作業執行後返回編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>傳回以唯讀模式的控制項; 不過，您可以保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制中編輯，或插入模式下，此屬性設定為適當的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.|
trans-unit.target: |模式 |描述 | |----------|-----------------| |`DetailsViewMode.Edit`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。 | |`DetailsViewMode.Insert`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。 | |`DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" name="DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" name="DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 刪除現有的記錄從資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The deletion does not occur if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in Insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果不會刪除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> event is raised immediately before the item is deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>之前刪除的項目，就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` to cancel the deletion.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`取消刪除。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面時，控制項執行刪除作業所呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面控制項執行刪除作業時所呼叫方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data rows when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定資料的外觀資料列時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditRowStyle property to control the appearance of the data rows when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制資料的外觀 EditRowStyle 屬性的資料列時使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data rows when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，代表資料的樣式的資料列時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row displayed when the data source bound to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定的空白資料列時，資料來源繫結至顯示外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項並未包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataRowStyle property to control the appearance of the empty data row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EmptyDataRowStyle 屬性來控制中的空白資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄時，會顯示空白資料列。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，可讓您設定空白資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者定義的內容，來轉譯時的空白資料列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the EmptyDataTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性來定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the null row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定 null 的資料列的自訂範本，先將`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，設定為空的資料列使用內建的 UI<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> and EmptyDataTemplate properties are set, the EmptyDataTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>和 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性會設定、 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含空白資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定来顯示空的資料列中的文字呈現時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataText property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EmptyDataText 屬性來指定要顯示空的資料列中的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the EmptyDataText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果這兩個 EmptyDataText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of EmptyDataText is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: EmptyDataText 的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 要在空白資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data-model validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用資料模型的驗證。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data model validation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料模型驗證已啟用。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side callback functions are used for paging operations in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用用戶端的回呼函式中的分頁作業<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the EnablePagingCallbacks property to specify whether paging operations are performed using client-side callback functions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EnablePagingCallbacks 屬性來指定是否分頁作業將會使用用戶端回呼函式。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, paging is performed using the callback feature, which prevents the need to post the page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，分頁是使用回撥功能，可避免需要將頁面回傳至伺服器來執行。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The client-side paging feature is only supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 and later and Netscape 6.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 用戶端分頁功能，才支援 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 及更新版本及 Netscape 6.0 及更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The value of EnablePagingCallbacks is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: EnablePagingCallbacks 的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use client-side callback functions for paging operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用的分頁作業; 用戶端的回呼函式否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*> method after verifying that the data listing control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>後確認資料清單控制項需要資料繫結，以及是否已指定有效的資料來源控制項的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: The data binding does not occur if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in Insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結不會發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field displayed and stores them in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取顯示每個欄位的值，並將它們儲存在指定<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The ExtractRowValues method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to retrieve the values of each field.
trans-unit.target: ExtractRowValues 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，以擷取每個欄位的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The values can them be used for data source operations.
trans-unit.target: 它們可用於資料來源作業的值可以。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the extracted values include read-only fields and key fields by using the `includeReadOnlyFields` and `includePrimaryKey` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定擷取的值使用是否包含唯讀欄位和索引鍵欄位`includeReadOnlyFields`和`includePrimaryKey`參數，分別。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> used to store the field values.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref>用來儲存欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括唯讀欄位。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the primary key field or fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包含主索引鍵欄位或欄位。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the header column in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定中的標頭資料行的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the FieldHeaderStyle property to control the appearance of the field header column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FieldHeaderStyle 屬性來控制中的欄位標頭資料行的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This is the column that contains the field names of the data values.
trans-unit.target: 這是包含資料值的欄位名稱的資料行。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FieldHeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `FieldHeaderStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FieldHeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FieldHeaderStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the header column in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示中的標頭資料行樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> objects that represent the explicitly declared row fields in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>物件，表示中的明確宣告的資料列欄位<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you explicitly declare the row fields for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, these row fields are stored in the Fields property (collection).
trans-unit.target: 當您明確宣告的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，這些欄位會儲存在 欄位屬性 （集合） 的資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The Fields collection also allows you to programmatically manage the collection of explicitly declared rows.
trans-unit.target: Fields 集合也可讓您以程式設計方式管理明確宣告的資料列的集合。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 明確宣告的資料列欄位可用於與自動產生的資料列欄位搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 同時使用時，明確宣告的資料列會首先呈現欄位，後面接著會自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated row fields are not added to the Fields collection.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生欄位不會加入至欄位集合的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 不同的資料列欄位型別決定控制項中的資料列的行為。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different row field types that can be used in the Fields collection.
trans-unit.target: 下表會顯示欄位集合中可用的欄位型別不同的資料列。

trans-unit.source: |Row field type|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>|Displays a command button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: |資料列欄位型別 |描述 | |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>|顯示為文字資料來源中欄位的值。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>|顯示命令按鈕在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>|Displays a check box in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您顯示具有自訂按鈕控制項，例如新增或移除按鈕的資料列。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>|顯示在核取方塊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>|Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>|Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>|顯示內建命令按鈕來執行編輯、 插入或刪除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中的作業。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField>|顯示為超連結資料來源中欄位的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>|Displays an image in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>|Displays user-defined content for a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項中顯示映像。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>|顯示使用者定義的內容中的資料列的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項根據指定的範本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageField>

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.| To explicitly declare the row fields for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您建立自訂的資料列欄位。 | 明確宣告的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制，第一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Next, add opening and closing `<Fields>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，加入 開啟和關閉`<Fields>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `<Fields>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 最後，列出您想要包含在開頭和結尾之間的資料列欄位`<Fields>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The row fields are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in the order that the row fields appear in the Fields collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料列欄位會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制資料列欄位會顯示欄位集合中的順序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Although you can programmatically add row fields to the Fields collection, it is easier to list the row fields declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of each row field to show or hide the row field.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以程式設計方式加入資料列欄位，欄位集合，會比較容易列出的資料列欄位以宣告方式在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制，然後使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>每個資料列欄位来顯示或隱藏資料列欄位的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>屬性的資料列欄位設定為`false`，資料列不會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制和資料列的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要看不到構成來回行程的資料列資料，加入欄位名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection"></xref> that contains all explicitly declared row fields in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection"> </xref>包含中的所有明確宣告的資料列欄位<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref>物件，代表頁尾資料列中的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterRow 屬性，若要以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件，代表頁尾資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項建立頁尾資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作頁尾資料列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the FooterRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 後必須執行 FooterRow 屬性所做的任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項將會覆寫任何變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref>頁尾資料列中的表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定頁尾資料列中的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterStyle property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterStyle 屬性來控制頁尾資料列中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `FooterStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FooterStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示頁尾資料列中的樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁尾資料列中的使用者定義內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or FooterTemplate property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>或 FooterTemplate 屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by using the FooterTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 FooterTemplate 屬性頁尾資料列的檔案，以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the footer row, first place `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定頁尾資料列的自訂範本，先將`<FooterTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<FooterTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can simply display text in the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以只顯示文字頁尾資料列中藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> and FooterTemplate properties are set, the FooterTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>和 FooterTemplate 屬性會設定、 FooterTemplate 屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the footer row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>包含頁尾資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the footer row of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在頁尾資料列中顯示的文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the FooterText or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時 FooterText 或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterText property to specify the text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterText 屬性來指定要在頁尾資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI) 頁尾資料列設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the FooterText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果這兩個 FooterText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of FooterText is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: FooterText 的值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 要在頁尾資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回回呼事件以控制項為目標的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to retrieve data and the GetCallbackResult method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>介面並使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>擷取資料和 GetCallbackResult 方法所擷取的資料傳回至控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回呼的結果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the callback string created using the specified argument.
trans-unit.target: 傳回使用指定的引數所建立的回呼字串。

trans-unit.source: The control that initiated the callback.
trans-unit.target: 初始化回呼控制項。

trans-unit.source: The callback code.
trans-unit.target: 回呼的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The complete callback string to be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至用戶端的完整回呼字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定格線樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項。
